verbs.description: [ARG1: at least 6 people] [V: shot] [ARGM-TMP: after funeral] [ARGM-LOC: on south side] at least six people were shot monday after a funeral in the burnside neighborhood on the south side authorities said the shooting happened around 12 20 p m in the 9200 block of south cottage grove avenue police spokesman anthony guglielmi said in a tweet one male was critically injured when he was shot in the head chicago police sgt rocco alioto said five other adults wounded in the shooting were stabilized at area hospitals early anthony guglielmi university of chicago medical center sgt rocco alioto chatham academy high school bernie jordan bethlehem star missionary baptist church advocate christ medical center burnside washington park oak lawn chicago sgt rocco alioto wgn aspoerre chicagotribune com advocate trinity hospital south side
